text: Avion Express is an airline based in Vilnius, Lithuania.„Avion Express“ tolimesnę perspektyvą sieja su Malta The airline operates a fleet of 39 aircraft on flights in Europe, North Africa, America and the Middle East. The airline is owned by Avion Solution Group.„Avion Express“ restruktūrizavimo planas sulaukė teismo patvirtinimo Avion Express was founded in 2005 as Nordic Solutions Air Services. ==References== ==Further reading== * Avion Express Category:2005 establishments in Europe Category:Establishments in Lithuania Category:Companies of Lithuania Category:Airlines of Europe
title: Avion Express
